examples.name: version-analysis
examples.description: Analyze git history to determine semantic version bumps
examples.instructions:
Analyze commits since the last tag and suggest the next semantic version based on conventional commits.

1. Get current version from latest git tag
2. Parse commits since that tag
3. Classify commits by type
4. Determine version bump (major/minor/patch)
5. Suggest next version with reasoning
